TestedMethod.name: public static void set(Object array, int index, Object value)

APITestDescription.Description: The test is against the set1010 method. It performs the following checks on the method. 1) The method sets values of expected types. 2) The NullPointerException gets thrown if the specified object is null. 3) The NullPointerException gets thrown if the array component type is primitive and the specified value is null. 4) The ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException gets thrown if the specified index argument is greater than or equal to the length of the specified array. 5) The ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException gets thrown if the specified index argument is negative. 6) The IllegalArgumentException gets thrown if the specified object is not an array.
